title: Overhaul Documentation
description: Completely update and reorganize project documentation including README.md and other markdown files to reflect current codebase structure, branding, and features.

title: Process Documentation
description: Create documentation for process management, maintenance scripts, log rotation, and server startup/shutdown procedures.

title: Core Documentation
description: Update and reorganize core documentation files including README.md, CONTRIBUTING.md, and LICENSE to reflect current branding, project structure, and features.

title: Update README.md
description: Completely overhaul the README.md to include current branding, project structure, features, installation instructions, usage examples, and contribution guidelines.

title: Technical Documentation
description: Document the technical architecture of the Windsurf Task Master MCP server including core components, MCP tools, task management system, and branding implementation.

title: Update CONTRIBUTING.md
description: Create or update CONTRIBUTING.md with guidelines for code style, pull requests, issue reporting, and development workflow.
